pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, December 4, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.    

Note for media:

    • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Assembly of First Nations Special Chiefs Assembly, and will participate in a Q&A with delegates.

Confederation Room, The Westin Ottawa
11 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for remarks and Q&A
    • Media are asked to present themselves to the Prince Edward Island Room, 4th Floor, no later than 3:45 p.m.
